Justification: To assess for any tenderness, swelling, or redness in the heel.

Physical Exam: Range of motion assessment of the ankle and foot
Justification: To assess for any range of motion limitations or pain with movement.

Physical Exam: Neurological examination of the foot, including sensation and reflexes
Justification: To assess for any neurological deficits, such as numbness or tingling.

Physical Exam: Muscle strength testing of the foot and ankle
Justification: To assess for any muscle weakness or atrophy.
To assess for any gait abnormalities.
